EmailTemplate.subject: Latest Cabin Management Solutions
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Latest Cabin Management Solutions Today, business jet owners need cabin management systems that allow passengers to stay productive and entertained while they are in the sky. Even during short flights, passengers require fully digital cabin management solutions that maximizes in-flight comfort, entertainment and productivity.
Honeywell's Ovation® Select cabin management system (Ovation Select) offers passengers a broad range of cabin entertainment, control and integrated communications to meet the demands of their busy schedules. In addition, Honeywell also offers a variety of connectivity solutions to meet your everyday business aviation needs.
Still flying with the Ovation C-Series?
